00019 /**
00020  * @file  CnchpCheck.cpp 
00021  * 
00022  * @brief Class for doing a check of two matrix files after regression run.
00023  */
00024 //
00025 
00026 #include "calvin_files/utils/src/Calvin.h"
00027 #include "util/CnchpCheck.h"
00028 #include "util/Fs.h"
00029 #include "util/RegressionCheck.h"
00030 #include "util/Util.h"
00031 #include "util/Verbose.h"
00032 //
00033 #include <cassert>
00034 #include <cstdlib>
00035 #include <cstring>
00036 #include <string>
00037 #include <set>
00038 #include <map>
00039 //
00040 
00041 
00042 bool CnchpCheck::check(std::string &msg) {
00043     msg = "";
00044     // Fix pathnames to work for this platform.
00045     m_NewDirectory = Fs::convertToUncPath(m_NewDirectory);
00046     m_GoldDirectory = Fs::convertToUncPath(m_GoldDirectory);
00047 
00048     bool bFilePass = true; 
00049     for (int iIndex=0; iIndex<m_vFileNames.size(); iIndex++ )
00050     {
00051 
00052         std::string goldFile = Fs::join(m_GoldDirectory , m_vFileNames[iIndex]) + "." + m_infix + ".CNCHP"; 
00053         std::string newFile = Fs::join(m_NewDirectory , m_vFileNames[iIndex]) + "." + m_infix + ".CNCHP"; 
00054         if (!Fs::isReadable(goldFile)) 
00055         {
00056             msg += "Can't open file: "+FS_QUOTE_PATH(goldFile)+" to read.";
00057             return false;
00058         }
00059         if (!Fs::isReadable(newFile)) 
00060         {
00061             msg += "Can't open file: "+FS_QUOTE_PATH(newFile)+" to read.";
00062             return false;
00063         }
00064 
00065         if(! Calvin::equivalent(
00066                                 goldFile,
00067                                 newFile,
00068                                 m_SetIgnore,
00069                                 m_SetSetIgnore,
00070                                 m_MapEpsilon,
00071                                 m_dEpsilon,
00072                                 m_dCorrelation,
00073                                 m_bCheckHeader)) 
00074         {
00075             bFilePass = false;
00076         }
00077     }
00078     return bFilePass;
00079 }
